Los Angeles (US: /lɔːs ˈændʒələs/ (￼gee ntị) iwu AN-jəl-əs; [lower-alpha 1] Spanish: Los Ángeles  [los ˈaŋxeles], lit.  'Ndị mmụọ ozi'), na-ezokarị ya na mkpịrịsị ya LA.A
,  bụ ebe azụmahịa, ego na omenala nke Southern California
Ebe ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ ruru nde 3.9 dị ka nke 2020[mmelite],  bụkwa obodo kachasị na steeti California na obodo nke abụọ kachasị na United States na-esote New York City, yana otu n'ime ụwa
obodo megasị ndị mmadụ kacha biri
A maara Los Angeles maka ihu igwe Mediterranean ya, agbụrụ na ọdịbendị dị iche iche, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Hollywood na mpaghara mepere emepe
Obodo Los Angeles dị na ọdọ mmiri dị na Southern California n'akụkụ oke osimiri Pasifik na-agafe na ugwu Santa Monica wee banye na ndagwurugwu San Fernando
Ọ na-ekpuchi ihe dị ka square kilomita 469 (1,210 km2),  na ọ bụ oche Los Angeles County, nke bụ mpaghara kacha nwee ọnụ na United States yana ihe ruru nde 9.86 dị ka nke 2022[mmelite].
